wiktionary_senses.definition: The act of doing that which begins anything; commencement of an action, state, or space of time; entrance into being or upon a course; the first act, effort, or state of a succession of acts or states.
That which is begun; a rudiment or element.
That which begins or originates something; the source or first cause.
The initial portion of some extended thing.
present participle and gerund of begin
Being the first portion of some extended thing.
